home.title: Welcome to our Bilingual App
home.description: This is a Next.js application with support for both English and Arabic languages.

hero.title: Transform Your Ideas Into Digital Reality
hero.description: We build innovative software solutions that drive business growth and deliver exceptional user experiences.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We specialize in creating powerful digital solutions for your business growth

business.title: Business Websites
business.description: Professional, responsive business websites designed to establish your online presence and drive growth. We create engaging user experiences that convert visitors into customers.

ecommerce.title: Modern E-commerce
ecommerce.description: Powerful e-commerce solutions that help you sell products online with ease. We build secure, scalable, and feature-rich online stores that drive sales.

about.title: About Nibras Dev
about.description1: Founded in 2025, Nibras Dev has grown from a small startup to a leading development company with a global presence. Our mission is to empower businesses through innovative technology solutions.
about.description2: With a team of skilled developers, designers, and strategists, were dedicated to delivering high-quality solutions that exceed client expectations and drive tangible business results.

technologies.title: Technologies We Work With
technologies.description: We leverage the latest technologies to build robust and scalable solutions.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.description: Hear from businesses that have transformed their operations with our solutions.

clients.name: Michael Johnson
clients.quote: DevMatrix transformed our business with their innovative solutions. Their team's expertise and dedication to quality exceeded our expectations.

clients.name: Sarah Williams
clients.quote: Working with DevMatrix has been a game-changer for our company. Their technical expertise and commitment to our success is unmatched.

clients.name: David Chen
clients.quote: The team at DevMatrix delivered a complex project on time and within budget. Their technical skills and communication made the process seamless.

callToAction.title: Ready to Start Your Project?
callToAction.description: Contact us today to discuss how we can help you achieve your digital goals.

hero.title: Our Services
hero.description: Comprehensive development solutions tailored to your business needs, delivering exceptional digital experiences that drive growth.

overview.title: Comprehensive Development Services
overview.description: We offer end-to-end development solutions to help businesses transform their digital presence and achieve their goals.

custom.title: Custom Development
custom.description: Tailored solutions designed specifically for your business needs, ensuring optimal performance and scalability.

uiux.title: UI/UX Design
uiux.description: Intuitive and engaging user experiences that enhance user satisfaction and drive conversions.

performance.title: Performance Optimization
performance.description: Speed and efficiency improvements to ensure your digital solutions perform at their best.

business.title: Building Powerful Business Websites
business.description: We create stunning, high-performance websites that establish your online presence and help you connect with your audience. Our business websites are:

features.title: Responsive Design
features.description: Websites that look and function perfectly on all devices, from desktops to smartphones.

features.title: SEO Optimized
features.description: Built with search engine visibility in mind to help your business rank higher and attract more visitors.

features.title: Fast Loading
features.description: Optimized for speed to ensure visitors stay engaged and conversion rates remain high.

features.title: Secure & Reliable
features.description: Implemented with the latest security measures to protect your data and your customers.

websiteTypes.title: Business Website Solutions
websiteTypes.description: We develop various types of business websites to meet your specific goals and requirements.

types.title: Corporate Websites
types.description: Professional websites that establish your brand identity and showcase your company's values, services, and achievements.

types.title: Marketing Websites
types.description: Conversion-focused websites designed to generate leads and promote specific products or services effectively.

types.title: Content Websites
types.description: Information-rich websites that position your business as an industry authority through blogs, resources, and media.

types.title: Service Websites
types.description: Detailed websites that showcase your services, expertise, and process to attract potential clients.

types.title: Portfolio Websites
types.description: Visually appealing websites that showcase your work, projects, and achievements to impress potential clients.

types.title: Booking Websites
types.description: Functional websites with appointment scheduling and reservation systems for service-based businesses.

ecommerce.title: Modern E-Commerce Solutions
ecommerce.description: We build powerful online stores that drive sales and provide seamless shopping experiences for your customers. Our e-commerce solutions include:

features.title: User-Friendly Shopping Experience
features.description: Intuitive navigation, product filtering, and search functionality to help customers find what they need quickly.

features.title: Secure Payment Processing
features.description: Integration with multiple payment gateways to provide safe and convenient checkout options.

features.title: Inventory Management
features.description: Robust systems to track stock levels, manage products, and automate inventory updates.

features.title: Analytics & Reporting
features.description: Comprehensive insights into sales, customer behavior, and store performance to guide business decisions.

platforms.title: E-Commerce Platforms We Work With
platforms.description: We leverage leading e-commerce platforms to build scalable and feature-rich online stores.

platforms.title: Shopify
platforms.description: Powerful and user-friendly platform ideal for businesses of all sizes, with extensive app ecosystem and excellent scalability.

platforms.title: WooCommerce
platforms.description: Flexible WordPress-based solution offering complete customization control and extensive plugin options.

platforms.title: Magento
platforms.description: Enterprise-grade platform with advanced features for large catalogs and complex business requirements.

process.title: Our Development Process
process.description: We follow a structured approach to deliver high-quality solutions that meet your business objectives.

steps.title: Discovery & Planning
steps.description: We analyze your requirements, understand your business goals, and develop a comprehensive project plan.

steps.title: Design & Prototyping
steps.description: We create wireframes and visual designs that align with your brand identity and user experience goals.

steps.title: Development & Testing
steps.description: Our developers build your solution using the latest technologies and conduct thorough testing to ensure quality.

steps.title: Launch & Support
steps.description: We deploy your solution and provide ongoing support and maintenance to ensure optimal performance.

story.title: From Startup to Industry Leader
story.imageAlt: Team of developers collaborating on a project in modern office with blue theme
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2015 by a small team of passionate developers, Nibras Dev began with a simple mission: to create technology solutions that make a real difference for businesses.
story.paragraph2: What started as a small operation has grown into a full-service development company with over 50 team members across multiple countries. Our growth has been driven by our commitment to quality, innovation, and client satisfaction.
story.paragraph3: Today, we're proud to have helped hundreds of businesses across various industries transform their digital presence and operations through custom software solutions.

mission.title: Mission & Values
mission.description: Our mission and values guide everything we do, from how we build our products to how we interact with our clients and each other.
mission.missionText1: To empower businesses with innovative technology solutions that drive growth, efficiency, and competitive advantage in a rapidly evolving digital landscape.
mission.missionText2: We're committed to creating software that not only meets the current needs of our clients but anticipates future challenges and opportunities in their industries.

values.title: Excellence
values.description: We strive for excellence in everything we do, from code quality to client communication, setting high standards for ourselves and our work.

values.title: Innovation
values.description: We embrace creativity and forward-thinking, continuously exploring new technologies and approaches to solve complex problems.

values.title: Collaboration
values.description: We believe in the power of teamwork, fostering an environment where diverse perspectives come together to create better solutions.

values.title: Integrity
values.description: We conduct business with honesty, transparency, and ethical practices, building trust with our clients and within our team.

milestones.title: Key Milestones
milestones.description: Our growth story is marked by continuous innovation, strategic expansion, and commitment to excellence.

timeline.description: Nibras Dev was founded with a small team of 5 developers focused on custom web application development.
Launched our mobile development division, expanding our service offerings and team to 15 members.
Opened our first international office and expanded our team to 30 members serving clients globally.
Launched our cloud solutions division and completed our 100th successful project delivery.
Received multiple industry awards for innovation and expanded our team to 45 members.
Now with 50+ team members and 200+ completed projects, we continue to innovate and expand our global presence.

footer.about: We are a leading web development company specializing in creating innovative digital solutions for businesses worldwide.

newsletter.title: Subscribe to Our Newsletter
newsletter.description: Stay updated with our latest news and updates

hero.title: Contact Us
hero.description: Reach out to our team to discuss your project requirements or get answers to your questions.
